name: Custom Tower Defense
description:
This game is a callback to the Warcraft 3 days where Tower Defense games were the best! You can build the path enemies walk on by strategically placing your turrets so it forces the enemies to stay on screen longer!

Early development game, started development 9/1/2021.

Hold shift to build, press Delete to delete the last tower built. 

The game is not very descriptive yet, please be aware this is not nearly close to a full game! This exists for playtesting!
